DOC.brief_summary: The study is a randomized controlled study comparing the metabolic effect of a 3 month intensive lifestyle modification intervention in Korean type 2 diabetic patients.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Lifestyle Modification on Metabolic Parameters in Type 2 Diabetic Patients
DOC.criteria: age 25 or older, type 2 diabetes mellitus, HbA1c 6.510% BMI 23 or higher. type 1 diabetes, recent (within 3 months) cardiovascular event, severe hepatic or renal dysfunction, insulin use, glucocorticoid use.
